p: Cancer is considered a multistage disease with multifactorial aetiology and is associated with high global incidence and mortality rates. Chemotherapy, surgery and radiation are still the most common treatment options for malignant tumors. However, all of them are associated with adverse-side effects, thus indicating the lack of specificity and the need for discovering new anti-tumor agents from various environmental resources [ 155, 156, 157]. To these ends, only recently, several studies have indicated the anti-tumor potential of various different SAAs.
